channel.title: Misc on Mehdi Azarmi
channel.description: Recent content in Misc on Mehdi Azarmi

item.title: first
item.description: These are some of the blogs that I’ve enjoyed following in the past few years and they’ve inspired me a lot: Henry Robinson (The paper trail) Salvatore Sanfilippo (antirez) Peter Bailis Adrian Colyer (the morning paper) I finally decided to start blogging after reading them for a long time! :) I will discuss about new papers related to distriubtued systems and other random stuff that I find interesting. Stay tuned!
